name: part_003
file: tmp_【#ひろがるホロライブDAY1】hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade hololive stage DAY1【チラ見せ】 [Of2b9eBHFS4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Advertisement for hololive production Vol.2 Weiss Schwarz Booster Pack.
Advertisement for hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade x JOYSOUND special collaboration.
Snippets of songs from the holo*27 album.
Extensive lineup of merchandise for hololive SUPER EXPO 2023 and hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade.

subtitles.original: 広がるヴァイスシュヴァルツ！
ブースターパック ホロライブプロダクション Vol.2

hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade x JOYSOUND
スペシャルコラボレーション

hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade x JOYSOUND
Special Collaboration

subtitles.original:
2023年5月28日(日)まで
全国の対象カラオケ店で実施中！
subtitles.english:
Through Sunday, May 28, 2023
Now underway at participating karaoke shops nationwide!

subtitles.original:
過去ライブの配信や豪華賞品が当たるキャンペーンなど
他にも企画が盛りだくさん！詳しくは みるハコ
subtitles.english:
Past live distribution, campaigns to win prizes,
and more! For details, check Miru Hako.

subtitles.original: 吐く息の白さも分ければ 最高の冬が逃げ出すほどに
subtitles.english: If we share even the whiteness of our breath, the best winter will run away

subtitles.original: だって全力になっちゃって もう止められないね 待って！
subtitles.english: Because I'm giving it my all, I can't be stopped anymore, wait!

subtitles.original: どうしちゃったの？絶対好き、絶対好き、絶対好きでしょ
subtitles.english: What's wrong? You definitely like it, definitely like it, definitely like it, right?

subtitles.original: Are you embarrassed? Now you're blushing somehow
subtitles.english: Are you embarrassed? Now you're blushing somehow

subtitles.original: グッズラインナップ紹介
オンライン通販も開始！
